about:
CC BY Attribution Requirements: Video games, videos*, musicâ€”simply put "qubodup" in a "Sounds" credits section or similar.

*However when the sound itself is the product, like in soundboards, sound effect YouTube videos, sound libraries, sound download sites etc. attribution must follow maximum strictness as laid out by section 3. a. of CC BY including but not limited to URL, name, title, changelog.

Theater plays and art installations: use simple attribution or use other creative ways to credit, don't sweat it.
